channel.title: Python on A minimal Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Python on A minimal Hugo website

item.title: Grow of Metropolis
item.description: About Aims: FIlter out the data localisation where people are supposed to live in (cities; villages etc) Select cities which are metropolis based on population on external source Write a script which will ascribe metropolis to a city. Additionally model a process of consecutive cities which would be ascribed to the city bearing in mind that city will grow thanks to this process. Data Source
